subject: Request for Quote - Enterprise License
body: Hi, we're interested in purchasing 500 enterprise licenses for our organization. Can you provide pricing and volume discounts?

subject: Demo Request - Your Product
body: I'd like to schedule a demo of your software. We're evaluating solutions for our team of 200 users.

subject: Pricing inquiry
body: What is the cost per user for your annual subscription? Do you offer educational discounts?

subject: Interested in your services
body: We saw your presentation at the conference and would like to learn more about partnership opportunities.

subject: RFP Response Needed
body: Please find attached our RFP. We need your response by end of month for the procurement process.

subject: Following up on our call
body: Great speaking with you yesterday. As discussed, please send over the proposal for the pilot program.

subject: Budget approved - Ready to proceed
body: Good news! Our budget has been approved. Let's schedule a call to finalize the contract.

subject: Need a quote ASAP
body: We need pricing for 100 licenses urgently. Decision needs to be made by Friday.

subject: Renewal discussion
body: Our subscription is expiring next month. Can we discuss renewal options and any new features?

subject: Upgrading our plan
body: We'd like to upgrade from the basic to premium tier. What's involved in the transition?

subject: Volume discount inquiry
body: If we increase our order to 1000 units, what kind of discount can you offer?

subject: Competitor comparison
body: How does your pricing compare to [Competitor]? We're evaluating both solutions.

subject: Trial extension request
body: Our team needs more time to evaluate. Can we extend the trial by 2 weeks?

subject: Custom solution needed
body: Our requirements are unique. Can we discuss a custom package for our needs?

subject: Partnership opportunity
body: We'd like to explore becoming a reseller partner in the APAC region.

subject: Contract negotiation
body: We've reviewed the contract. Can we discuss the SLA terms and payment schedule?

subject: Proof of concept request
body: Before committing, we'd like to run a POC with a small team. Is this possible?

subject: Bulk purchase inquiry
body: We're a distributor looking to purchase in bulk. What are your wholesale terms?

subject: Sales meeting follow-up
body: Thank you for the meeting. Please send the case studies you mentioned.

subject: Ready to buy
body: We've completed our evaluation and are ready to proceed with the purchase.

subject: Quote revision needed
body: The quote you sent has some items we don't need. Can you revise it?

subject: Multi-year deal discussion
body: We're interested in a 3-year agreement. What additional discounts are available?

subject: Procurement process
body: Our procurement team needs W-9, insurance certificates, and references.

subject: Decision maker intro
body: I'd like to introduce you to our CTO who will make the final decision.

subject: Competitive bid situation
body: We have quotes from 3 vendors. Your price needs to be competitive to win.

subject: Upsell opportunity
body: We love the basic product. Tell me about the advanced features.

subject: New customer inquiry
body: We're a startup looking for a solution. Do you have startup pricing?

subject: Government pricing
body: Do you have GSA schedule pricing for federal agencies?

subject: Request for proposal
body: Please submit your proposal for our digital transformation project.

subject: Sales presentation request
body: Can you present to our leadership team next Tuesday?

subject: Job Application - Software Engineer
body: Please find attached my resume and cover letter for the Software Engineer position.

subject: Interview availability
body: I'm available for an interview Monday through Wednesday next week.

subject: Application status inquiry
body: I applied two weeks ago and wanted to check on the status of my application.

subject: Salary negotiation
body: Thank you for the offer. I'd like to discuss the compensation package.

subject: Benefits question
body: Can you explain the health insurance options and 401k matching?

subject: Vacation request
body: I'd like to request PTO from December 20-31 for the holidays.

subject: Sick leave notification
body: I'm not feeling well and will be taking a sick day today.

subject: Resignation letter
body: Please accept this as my formal notice of resignation, effective in two weeks.

subject: Reference request
body: Would you be willing to serve as a professional reference for me?

subject: Payroll discrepancy
body: My last paycheck seems incorrect. I'm missing 8 hours of overtime.

subject: Work from home request
body: I'd like to request permission to work remotely on Fridays.

subject: Training opportunity
body: I found a relevant conference. Can the company sponsor my attendance?

subject: Performance review scheduling
body: When can we schedule my annual performance review?

subject: Promotion inquiry

subject: Employee referral
body: I'd like to refer my former colleague for the open position.

subject: Harassment complaint
body: I need to report an incident that occurred in the workplace.

body: I need to request a reasonable accommodation for a medical condition.
